bibl.title: Reading the Authorial Strategies in the Derveni Papyrus. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Attempts to explore some literary aspects of the Derveni papyrus (usually interpreted within a religious, allegorical or exegetical framework), by focusing on the authorial persona dominating the text.
bibl.seg: SISTAKOU Evina, Reading the Authorial Strategies in the Derveni Papyrus. Avec résumé en anglais.

Attempts to explore some literary aspects of the Derveni papyrus (usually interpreted within a religious, allegorical or exegetical framework), by focusing on the authorial persona dominating the text.
